entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, 0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 10:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 77 %

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
